description: State component tracking what an aimable item is currently aimed at. Present only when item is actively aimed. Removed when aim is lowered.

targetId.description: Entity ID of the target being aimed at

aimedBy.description: Entity ID of the actor aiming the item

activityMetadata.description: Inline metadata for activity description generation. Allows this component to define how it should be described in activity summaries without requiring a separate metadata component.

shouldDescribeInActivity.description: Whether this component should be included in activity descriptions. Set to false to hide from activity summaries.

template.description: Template string with placeholders for display

targetRole.description: Property name in this component's data containing the target entity ID

priority.description: Display priority for activity ordering. Higher values appear first. Range: 0-100.
